    FederatedAccess
    Conditions required for a User to have access to a graph within the FederatedStore via FederatedAccess User Ops AccessHook Ops User added graph hasAccess? 'A' 'A' n/a T 'A','B' 'A' n/a T 'A' 'A','B' n/a T 'A' 'B' F F 'A' 'B' T T n/a null T T n/a null F F n/a empty T T n/a empty F F
    FederatedAccess.Builder  
    FederatedGraphStorage  
    FederatedStore
    A Store that encapsulates a collection of sub-graphs and executes operations against them and returns results as though it was a single graph.
    FederatedStoreCache
    Wrapper around the CacheServiceLoader to provide an interface for handling the Graphs within a FederatedStore.
    FederatedStoreConstants  
    FederatedStoreProperties
    Additional StoreProperties for the FederatedStore.
